alert.note: Alert for Las Animas (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued July 05 at 5:10PM MDT until July 05 at 5:45PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Southwestern Las Animas County in southeastern Colorado... * Until 545 PM MDT. * At 510 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Trinidad, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and hail up to three inches in diameter. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This tornadic thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of southwestern Las Animas County. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...3.00 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
